alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:54PM MDT until July 30 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CAMPBELL AND NORTHWESTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 454 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Biddle to 15 miles north of Weston to 3 miles southeast of Recluse, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Weston, Lightning Flat and Rockypoint. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
